@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+// opened to store code clips
+//clockChecker
+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+
+

+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(){
+      
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1];
+        const event = this.parentNode.childNodes
+
+        console.log(hour);
+
+        console.log(event)
+        
+        // grab the sibilibgs of the save button
+
+        // save to localStorage
+    })
+}
+
+

+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(){
+      
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1];
+        const event = this.previousElementSibling;

+        // save to localStorage

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+// opened to store code clips

+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+
+
+
+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(){
+      
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1];

+        console.log(hour);

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+// opened to store code clips
+//clockChecker
+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+
+
+
+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(e){
+        e.preventDefault();
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1];
+        const event = this.previousElementSibling;
+
+        console.log(hour);
+
+        console.log(event);
+     
+        // grab the sibilibgs of the save button
+
+        // save to localStorage
+    })
+}
+
+
+

@@ -0,0 +1,30 @@
+// opened to store code clips
+//clockChecker
+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+
+
+
+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(e){
+        e.preventDefault();
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1].innerText;
+        const event = this.previousElementSibling;
+
+        console.log(hour);
+
+        console.log(event);
+     
+        // grab the sibilibgs of the save button
+
+        // save to localStorage
+    })
+}

@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+// opened to store code clips
+//clockChecker
+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+//undo button (optional)
+// color on entry; goes away if another box is clicked (native?)
+
+
+
+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(e){
+        
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1].innerText;
+        const event = this.previousElementSibling;
+
+        console.log(hour);
+
+        console.log(event);
+     
+        // grab the sibilibgs of the save button
+
+        // save to localStorage
+    })
+}
+
+
+

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,32 @@
+// opened to store code clips
+//clockChecker
+//uploadEvents
+//downloadEvents
+//listener
+//undo button (optional)
+// color on entry; saves if another box is clicked
+
+// use onblur and/or onsubmit https://www.w3schools.com/tags/ref_eventattributes.asp
+// looks like .description is used for event description?
+
+const allButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('saveBtn');
+
+
+for(var i =0; i < allButtons.length; i++){
+    allButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function(e){
+        
+        const hour = this.parentNode.childNodes[1].innerText;
+        const event = this.previousElementSibling;
+
+        console.log(hour);
+
+        console.log(event);
+     
+        // grab the sibilibgs of the save button
+
+        // save to localStorage
+    })
+}
+
+
+
